dict.acceptation: 遗骨，遗体，残骸，残余，遗迹；废墟，遗址，遗迹，剩余（物），余额；
留下( remain 的第三人称单数)；保持；留待；仍然是；

sent.orig: While beacon or transponder on the ROV remains within the reaction radius, the vessel remains stationary.
sent.trans: 而ROV上的灯塔或转发器保持在反应半径内，使该船仍平稳。

sent.orig: This byelaw encourages citizen alms remains and organ, prohibit remains and, organ.
sent.trans: 该条规勉励人民捐输尸体和器官，严禁生意尸体、器官。

sent.orig: The network remains in Baghdad. Zarqawi still remains at large to come and go.
sent.trans: 但巴格达的恐怖网络依然存在，扎卡威仍自由自在地逍遥法外。

sent.orig: The Shaoxing yellow wine organic phosphorus remains, the pyrethrum remains had not picked out.
sent.trans: 绍兴黄酒有机磷残留，菊酯类残留均未检出。

sent.orig: Our economy continues to grow, our financial foundation remains solid, our society remains pluralistic, and our politicians continue to debate openly on all the topical issues.
sent.trans: 香港的经济继续蓬勃增长，财政基础依然稳固，社会维持多元化。
